__e: Guy who picked me up made me do stuff to him every night till we got to the city. Then he pulled over on the FDR and just pushed me out of the van.
So they walk me into the back room of the Roosevelt, mind you, I still think I'm just going to meet Leo, and out of nowhere, a hundred people jump out screaming "Happy birthday."
Touch one hair on his head and you'll answer to Teddy Roosevelt and the United States government!
